ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 512
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Date: Mon, 24 Jun 2002 21:51:37 -0000 From: dnelle74  Subject: How Expensive is Smithing? Is it going
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Date: Mon, 24 Jun 2002 21:51:37 -0000
From: "dnelle74" <dnelle74@...>
Subject: How Expensive is Smithing?

Is it going to kill my bank account or what? I also want to make
arrowheads for my Fletching skill. I think it would be cheaper.
What do u all think? I've been to eqtraders.com. I'd just like your
opinions.
--------------------------------

Smithing is by it's very nature expensive but there's no reason why you
can't make arrowheads, they are kind of low on trivial and they make alot
unless you are making the new cultural arrowheads for woodelves or acrylia
ones.
